comment: Characterization of the elements of an ordered pair. Exercise 3 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 15. (Contributed by NM, 15-Jul-1993.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2015.) Remove an extraneous hypothesis. (Revised by BJ, 25-Dec-2020.) (Avoid depending on this detail.)
